action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Closed

full_threads.body:
Hi Khemany,

I hope you have been well. Just jumping in for Chris as he is away sick.

Please see this page: https://royalrehablifeworks.com.au/petersham/ - is that what you were after?

Hi Chris,

Just looking on RRLW Petersham home page and notice the change hasn't been implemented. Can you please advise?

Thanks,

Khem

action.text: Chris Paradowski assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia

full_threads.body:
Hi Khemany,

We have prepared a draft page for your review, you can see it here: https://royalrehablifeworks.com.au/petersham-v2/

Please note, the page is set to private so you will need to log in to the WordPress dash to view it.

Once approved, we'll apply the changes to the live site.

chris, please check.
we made a duplicate page for this one, https://royalrehablifeworks.com.au/petersham-v2/

30mins

Hi Khemany,

Jumping in on behalf of Heath. 

We can absolutely help with the amendments. 

We'll create a staging server to and present the amendments for approval before going live. We expect to have an update for you early next week.

action.text: Glen Tenorio assigned to Glen Tenorio
Heath Maguire moved this conversation from the Unknown Mailbox inbox

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath,

I wanted to amend the layout of the services anywhere where the below is located on the site.
Currently our Services and Group Classes are all together I want one section to be 'Our Range of Services' and the other the be 'Our Group Classes'

Are you able to assist with this?

Services are:
Exercise Physiology
Physiotherapy
Occupational Therapy
Hydrotherapy

Group Classes
PD Warrior
GLA: D
Life Strong
Hydrotherapy (Same page as above)
